entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry Potter is described as the 'Potter brat' by Kreacher. He is also mentioned in the same sentence as Dumbledore.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is introduced as a person who finishes the name of the creature, Kreacher.

entities.name: kreacher
entities.description: Kreacher is described as a house-elf that belongs to Miss Bellatrix and the Blacks. He is also mentioned as being on the Dursleys' carpet.

entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is introduced as a person who draws his feet off the floor when Kreacher enters the room.

entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: Aunt Petunia is mentioned as letting out a hair-raising shriek when she sees Kreacher.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is introduced as a person who bellowed 'What the hell is that?' when he sees Kreacher.

entities.name: miss bellatrix
entities.description: Miss Bellatrix is mentioned as the mistress of Kreacher.

entities.name: the blacks
entities.description: The Blacks are introduced as a family that Kreacher belongs to.

relationships.description: Kreacher is described as belonging to Miss Bellatrix.
Kreacher is mentioned as belonging to the Blacks.
